μ→δ\_preferred: Rewrite δ∘μ as μ→δ when possible.
Φ∘μ\_preferred: Projection acts after weighting when semantic form is intended.
Π∘μ\_preferred: Evaluation of weighted fields takes precedence over weighting the evaluated result.
tensor\_ordering: μ⊗ must be placed before δ⊗ or Φ⊗ for canonical form.
